description: Code execution: write time utils in Java and Python, execute, verify output

steps.userQuery: write a java program that prints the current local time and run it
steps.description: Coder writes Java time util, executes via JBang

agentResponses.responseFallback: {"pass": true, "summary": "Java time program written and executed successfully"}

steps.userQuery: now write a python script that prints the current local time and run it
steps.description: Coder writes Python time util, executes via python3

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll write a Python script to print the current time.

<tool_call>
{"name": "write_file", "args": {"path": "/tmp/javaclaw_time_check.py", "content": "from datetime import datetime\nnow = datetime.now()\nprint(f\"CURRENT_TIME={now.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\")"}}
</tool_call>
{"pass": true, "summary": "Python time script written and executed successfully"}

steps.description: Coder cleans up the temp files from both steps

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll clean up both temporary files.

<tool_call>
{"name": "shell_exec", "args": {"command": "rm -f /tmp/JavaClawTimeCheck.java /tmp/javaclaw_time_check.py && echo 'Cleaned up both temp files'"}}
</tool_call>
